events.text: John sees the risen Christ and receives the command to write
Messages are sent to the seven churches of Asia
John sees the throne in heaven and worship around it
The Lamb takes the scroll and begins opening seals
Four horsemen ride forth with judgments
Martyrs cry out and cosmic signs appear
Seven trumpets sound with escalating judgments
A mighty angel appears with a little scroll
John measures the temple and two witnesses testify
A woman, a dragon, and a male child are revealed
A beast from the sea and a beast from the earth arise
The Lamb stands with the faithful on Mount Zion
Three angels proclaim warnings and announcements
The Son of Man reaps the earth in harvest imagery
Seven bowls of God’s wrath are poured out
Babylon the great is described and then falls
Heaven rejoices over Babylon’s fall
Christ comes as a rider on a white horse to judge and wage war
The beast and false prophet are seized and cast into fire
Satan is bound for a thousand years and the saints reign
Satan is released briefly and then cast into the lake of fire
The dead are judged before the great white throne
A new heaven, new earth, and new Jerusalem are shown
The river of life and tree of life are described with final invitation
